attributes.action: Car insurance companys. Stop ripping people off!
attributes.additional_details: Recently the cost of running Vehicle has exploded. Not helping with this is the COST OF INSURANCE. The insurance companys need to be investigated as there is no reasion for such a hike. People are getting more and more angry with the cost of insurance companys and now needs the Government to step in and sort this problem out sooner than later. Cost of living is hitting everybody in this contry hard. Isnit about time we had a break and have a competitvie and CHEAP insurance companys providing good honest insurance cover for are Vehicles
